934.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.tldr: They can change the terms of service any time they see fit, even without notification to the user. Your use of the service supposedly constitutes acceptance of the changes in the terms.

1061.license-for-this-file: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ or send a letter to Creative Commons, 444 Castro Street, Suite 900, Mountain View, California, 94041, .USA
1061.title: You cannot delete your account

tosdr.case: no right to leave the service
tosdr.tldr: It is impossible to delete your account from this service, according to the AccountKiller blacklist.

1098.title: You agree never to publish reputation-damaging opinions about Skype

tosdr.case: you may not express negative opinions about them
tosdr.tldr: When signing up as a Skype user, you agree you will never publish a link to the Skype Website that damages their reputation.
